snippet: The Girl Scouts are facing an official inquiry by the United States Conference of Catholic Bishops.
abstract: United States Conference of Catholic Bishops will conduct an official inquiry into the Girl Scouts; at issue are program materials that some Catholics find offensive, and assertion that the Scouts associate with groups espousing stances in conflict with church teaching.
lead_paragraph: The Girl Scouts are facing an official inquiry by the United States Conference of Catholic Bishops.

headline.main: Bishops Group to Investigate Girl Scouts
headline.print_headline: Bishops Group To Investigate Girl Scouts

keywords.value: United States Conference of Catholic Bishops
keywords.name: organizations
